title: Request to Cancel Service with Retention Offer
description: A customer wants to cancel due to high price. The agent must attempt a retention offer.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer and understand the reason for cancellation (price).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the customer's identity and logs 'Price' as the cancellation reason.

tasks.description: Check the system for any available retention offers for this customer's profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a '20% off for 12 months' retention offer.

tasks.description: Present the retention offer to the customer. If accepted, apply it. If declined, proceed with cancellation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the offer. Customer accepts. Agent applies the promotional discount.
